SEARCH
Package etu2011.framework.renderer

Class ModelView

java.lang.Object
etu2011.framework.renderer.ModelView
public class ModelView extends Object
The ModelView class is used to render a view when being handled by the framework.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ModelView(String view)
    Default controller.

    Controller with data.

    • ModelView

      public ModelView(String view)
      Default controller.
      Parameters:

    • ModelView

      public ModelView(String view, Map<String,Object> data, boolean isJson, Map<String,Object> session, List<String> sessionToRemove)
      Controller with data.
      Parameters:
      view - the view inside the application default views directory to render.
      data - the data to be passed to the view.
      isJson - whether the data will be parsed to JSON or not.
      session - the session data to be passed to the request sessions.
